name: Slowking
flavorText:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

previous.name: Murkrow
previous.flavorText:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

next.name: Misdreavus
next.flavorText:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.flavorText:
Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.flavorText:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.
